text: @realDonaldTrump If COVID19 is real, then within a couple of weeks or so a very large percentage of these so called “peaceful protesters” will no longer be “peacefully protesting” now will they? It’s hard to “peaceful protest” when your “peacefully” dead from a killer virus.
